com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.view

Class FriendsListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.view.FriendsListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class FriendsListController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controls the friends list side bar, works with StatComparisonController which needs to be set using the setStatComparisonController
    Author:
    KimW

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane borderPane
      BorderPane added to friends list.

      Top AnchorPane in the fxml

      Title label for friends list

      The expanded version of the friends list
      private javafx.scene.image.Image IMAGE_TEST
      Test image used as profile picture in case of an exception
      private double normalWidth
      Friends list's wider width, default width when application is started
      private javafx.scene.control.Button resizeButton
      Button for resizing the friends list
      private StatComparisonController scCont
      Controller for comparing statistics with your Steam friends
      private double smallWidth
      Friends list's smaller width

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the side bar by creating the toggle button and giving it its function, then calls the method to load the users friends in
      private void loadFriends()
      loads the friends into the friends list, minimized one is separate from the expanded one
      void setStatComparisonController(StatComparisonController scCont)
      Sets the StatComparisonController so that the friends list's compare buttons work
      void toggleComparisonView(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name)
      Opens the Comparison view and updates it with the stats of the given ID
      void toggleSize()
      Toggles the friends list side bar between the minimized and expanded versions

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
